awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 9 nominations.

fullplot: On any day of the week, you could expect a newborn baby to be nurtured and loved by his older sister. Except, of course, if it's Wednesday. Pubert is the latest addition to the Addams family and, to prevent sibling rivalry escalating to fratricide, Wednesday and Pugsley are shipped off to summer camp and a nanny is hired. Debby Jellinsky is great with wrinkling baldies, which makes her the perfect nanny for Pubert and the unlikely wife of Uncle Fester. The question is..."Is she grave-digging or gold-digging?"
plot: A comical Gothic horror-movie-type family tries to rescue their beloved uncle from his gold-digging new love.
title: Addams Family Values

tomatoes.consensus: New, well-developed characters add dimension to this batty satire, creating a comedy much more substantial than the original.
